[h1]Manipulating CSS[/h1]
 
The [b] removeClass[/b]() method removes one or more class names from the selected elements.
[b]For example:[/b][code format="js" codeId="1116"]$("div").[b]removeClass[/b]("red");[/code]
The code above removes the class "red" from the div element.
[note]Again, multiple class names can be specified by separating them using spaces.[/note]
